Disguise Self (Trickery1 Illu): Self changes appearance and gains +10 Disguise for 10 min
Dispel Magic (Magic3 Abju): R110' Self d20+1 check vs. 11+caster level cancels spells or effects in 20' radius
Divination (Knowledge4 Divi): Self has 71% chance to learn useful advice on act proposed up to 1 week in the future
False Vision (Trickery5 Illu): Scrying of touched 40' radius shows illusion for 1 hr
Find The Path (Knowledge6 Divi): Touched knows most direct route to location for 10 min
Foresight (Knowledge9 Divi): Self gains +2 AC and Reflex and never surprised or flat-footed for 10 min
Identify (Magic2 Divi): Self determines magic properties of touched
Imbue With Spell Ability (Magic4 Evoc): Grants to touched with 1/3/5 HD the ability to cast specified 1st/2x1st/2x1st+2nd level spells
Invisibility (Trickery2 Illu): Touched becomes invisible for 1 min or until attacks
Legend Lore (Knowledge7 Divi): Self learns legends about target person, place, or object
Mislead (Trickery6 Illu): R25' Makes self invisible for 1 rd and creates false double (DC 18 Will disbelieve) for conc + 3 rd
Mordenkainen's Disjunction (Magic9 Abju): R25' Spells in 40' radius dispelled, magic items disenchanted, 1% chance to disenchant artifacts or destroy antimagic field (DC 21 Will neg)
Nondetection (Trickery3 Abju): Touched gains SR 12 (divination) (or self gains SR 16) for 1 hr
Nystul's Magic Aura (Magic1 Illu): Alters aura of up to 5 lb object for 1 dy
Polymorph Any Object (Trickery8 Tran): R25' Target becomes something else (DC 20 Fort neg)
Protection From Spells (Magic8 Abju): Touched gains +8 saves vs. spells for 10 min
Screen (Trickery7 Illu): R25' Illusion hides 1 30' cu from vision and scrying (DC 19 Will disbelieve) for 1 dy
Spell Resistance (Magic5 Abju): Touched gains SR 13 for 1 min
Spell Turning (Magic7 Abju): 1d4+6 levels of non-area, non-ranged-touch spells directed at self reflect onto caster for 10 min
Time Stop (Trickery9 Tran): All but self halt and become invulnerable for 1d4+1 rd
True Seeing (Knowledge5 Divi): Touched sees through 120' darkness, illusion, and invisibility for 1 min
